嗆咕 [ qiāng gu ]: to discuss (dialect)
①有刺激性的氣味使鼻、嗓等器官感到不舒服。

嗆字的基本解释

嗆
qiàng
见“呛”。

嗆字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiāng］
［《集韻》千羊切，平陽，清。］
“呛1”的繁体字。
(1)鸟吃食。
(2)水或食物进入气管，引起气逆咳嗽，又突然喷出。
(3)象声词。参见“嗆嗆”。
[②]［qiàng］
［《字彙》七相切］
“呛2”的繁体字。
(1)有刺激性的气体进入嗅觉器官、呼吸器官或视觉器官，使人感觉难受。
(2)喻指说话生硬尖刻有火气。
(3)受，忍受。
(4)方言。吃，大吃。
[③]［chéng］
［《集韻》鋤庚切，平庚，崇。］
“呛3”的繁体字。
见“嗆3啍”。
[④]［qiǎng］
“呛4”的繁体字。
见“嗆4白”。

嗆字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　嗆； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页202第03
【集韻】千羊切，音鏘。【玉篇】鳥食也。　又【集韻】一曰愚貌。　又【集韻】鋤庚切，音傖。嗆哼，愚怯。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiāng］
["Jiyun" Thousand Sheep Cuts, Pingyang, Qing Dynasty. ]
"呛1" in traditional characters.
(1) Birds eat food.
(2) Water or food enters the trachea, causing a qi-inverse cough, and then burst out suddenly.
(3) Onomatopoeia. See also "choking".
[②]［qiàng］
[Seven Tangents in "Words"]
"呛2" in traditional characters.
(1) The irritating gas enters the olfactory organs, respiratory organs or visual organs, making people feel uncomfortable.
(2) The metaphor refers to the harsh and irritating speech.
(3) Endure, endure.
(4) Dialects. Eat, eat.
[③]［chéng］
["Ji Yun" Hoe Gengqie, Ping Geng, Chong. ]
"呛3" in traditional characters.
See "Choke 3 啍".
[④]［qiǎng］
"呛4" in traditional characters.
See "Choke 4 White".
choke
